Dialogue: Everything is in its place. Not a single item out of order.
It's almost unnerving how meticulous the arrangement is.
The paintings on the wall are flawless in their symmetry.
But I wonder if they are hiding something behind their perfection.
The drawer is slightly open.
Inside, there are documents related to the sale of the company.
Strange. Why would he leave such sensitive papers here?
The frame is shattered, and the portrait is upside down.
What happened here?
This can't be an accident.
This piano looks expensive.
It seems like it was a centerpiece of the party.
I wonder if it played any role in what happened last night.
These ceramic pieces are neatly arranged by size.
But there's one that seems out of place.
Why is it not in the right order?
The smell of food and cigarettes still lingers in the air.
This place was clearly chaotic last night. But what does it all mean?
The muddy path is littered with footprints, too many to distinguish any single one.
It seems like countless people have passed through here.
It's nearly impossible for the police to identify a specific trace.
The victim's body lies in the south room, half-hidden by scattered chairs.
His face is bruised and swollen.
The most disturbing part is the clear and sharp mark across his neck, stretching from his throat down to the nape of his neck. It’s nearly severed.
A ladder rests against the wall, carelessly placed.
It's unclear whether it was meant to be used in the crime or if it was simply abandoned here.
Still, it’s odd that it’s positioned so close to the body.
This photo captures a lively scene from the party.
Fifteen people, all smiling and posing for the camera.
Some seated, others standing, all dressed in vibrant colors.
It's a cheerful moment frozen in time, but something feels off.
